channel.title: DEBUG on MADDIV
channel.description: Recent content in DEBUG on MADDIV

item.title: Authentication operator degraded
item.description: Nejde se zalogovat prez konzoli. Authentication operator je ve stavu Degraded. Authentication and Authentication Operator # cluster operator oc get co # operator logs set ns openshift-authentication-operator;oc logs -n "$ns" (oc get pods -n "$ns" -o name) # warning and errors set ns openshift-authentication-operator;oc logs -n "$ns" (oc get pods -n "$ns" -o name)|grep -E "[W,E][[:digit:]]{4}" OAuthClientsDegraded: the server is currently unable to handle the request (get oauthclients.

item.title: Node NotReady, SchedulingDisabled
item.description: After upgrade to version 4.3.3 two nodes (one master and one worker) are in state NotReady. Cluster seems to be ok, but I cannot ssh into affected nodes and cannot get some debug info.
